a24c3c19-06a3-48b3-bb2b-aa35b9023874.description: This award is given to the Microsoft LATAM field for their contributions and support of the Azure Migrate & Modernize Program (AMMP). It is a recognition of their dedication, support and sponsorship of the AMMP program and its impact helping customers to migrate and modernize their workloads successfully.
a24c3c19-06a3-48b3-bb2b-aa35b9023874.name: AMMP LATAM Champ
